title: Tally Counter
summaries: The Tally Counter is an informational accessory which displays how many enemies of a type have been killed. The Tally Counter will first display "Kill count unavailable" underneath the map/health area and, after an enemy has been attacked, the text will display how many times that enemy has ever been killed by all players combined in that world. The kill count will only display the last enemy struck by the player or their minions. It will count deaths from world creation rather than from when it was equipped. The Tally Counter has a 1/100 (1%) chance of being dropped from Angry Bones, Cursed Skulls, and Dark Casters, all of which are found in the Dungeon.

The Tally Counter is one of the three parts necessary to make the <linked>R.E.K. 3000</linked>, with the others being the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> and the <linked>Radar</linked>, and as such is a required ingredient in <linked>crafting</linked> the <linked>Shellphone</linked>.
